page.title: 19BIRTH OF CRSTWOOD SCHOOL(2)
page.content: Puzzling to find the roostings that once were Boyatt Wood Symmetrical footpaths meander across bridges, pass rows of shops, Heading towards the towering,crescent centre piece of the Community. Mothers and Fathers,toddlers and the elderly,together Join with the schoolchildren,and follow their respective flight paths, Illuminated by a series of white planets, Guiding the community into this curved majestic meeting place. The entrance screen at the end of the crescent Is approached with a sense of awe and wonder, Rising up like the great West door of near-by Winchester Cathedral. As you pass through the porthole entrance doors,
